dc.title: IGS -- International GNSS Service, formerly the International GPS Service
dc.description: The International GNSS Service (IGS), formerly the International GPS Service, is a federation of over 200 worldwide agencies collaborating to form a global network of over 300 permanent, continuous GPS and GLONASS tracking sites, and to analyze this data set to form precise products, and to make the data and products available.

GNSS
GLONASS
